line.originaltext: 2 cups all-purpose flour
2 teaspoons baking soda
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
2 cups white sugar
1 cup vegetable oil
3 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup chopped walnuts
1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained")

line.originaltext: 2 cups carrots, grated
1 cup flaked coconut
1/2 cup butter
1 cup white sugar
1/2 cup buttermilk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Grease a 9x13 inch pan.
Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2}, ing15, "sifted stuff", "sift together")

line.originaltext: Set aside.
In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended.
In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
line.annotation: mix(ing5, t3, ing17, "beat eggs", "beat one at a time")

line.originaltext: Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing16, ing17}, ing18, "vanilla eggs", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated.
Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing19, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing20, "fruity batter", "fold in")

line.originaltext: Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork.
While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork.
line.annotation: do(ing21, t4, ing22, "holey cake", "poke holes with fork")

line.originaltext: For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla.
For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla.
For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla.
Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing23, , ing24, "boiled glaze", "boil over medium head")

line.originaltext: Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing24, t5, ing25, "hot glaze", "reduce heat for 5 minutes")

line.originaltext: Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
